subject: Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Joe Tartamella, 32, has never been a head coach, but had served on the St. John’s staff for nine seasons, the last four as the associate head coach.
snippet: Joe Tartamella, 32, has never been a head coach, but had served on the St. John’s staff for nine seasons, the last four as the associate head coach.
